__e: You should have told me you were not a painter of houses.
Well, you know, you might be the world's greatest house painter-- although who would know the difference?
Why is he a house painter?
The painter in which you turned, that I pity for.
I don't know why, but for some reason it kind of-- it kind of reminded me of this painter that I really like.
No, I was thinking of a friend, a painter... Not a bad one, at that.
That is why I am the painter and you are the doctor.
And I thought if someone so successful like you would talk to him, you might just cheer him up.
I did go to Harvard, you see... and I was an alumnus... but that was before I became a painter, and now I'm not anymore.
The only one the painter never saw with his own eyes.
Not a painter, by you, is nothing!
The painter wouldn't leave until he spoke to Harry directly, who picked up the call right away, of course.
